requirements.summary: Replace the answered (post-"Yes") view with a single "Good Choice" meme image and remove the two existing images.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the "Yes" button transitions the UI to an answered state.
The answered state renders exactly one image: the "Good Choice" meme.
The answered state no longer renders the two images currently shown (Bible verse and "Marry me").
All user-facing text remains in English.

file_operations.description: Update the answered-state render branch to display exactly one using src "/assets/generated/valentine-good-choice-meme.dim_1200x800.png" and remove the two existing answered-state images (Bible verse + "Marry me"); ensure the answered state still triggers on the existing Yes button click and that any remaining user-facing text is English-only.

requirements.summary: Add the "Good Choice" meme image as a static public asset and reference it directly from the answered state.
acceptanceCriteria: A single image file for the "Good Choice" meme exists under the frontend public generated assets directory.
The answered state references the static asset via an absolute public path (e.g., "/assets/generated/...png").
No backend code is added or used to serve the image.

file_operations.description: Add the provided generated image file to the public generated assets directory so it can be served statically by the frontend build (no backend involvement).
